title: Here Come the Big Hitters: Sepp Kuss, Remco Evenepoel Debut Expectation-Loaded Seasons This Weekend
content:
Kuss kick-starts in Spain on Saturday, Evenepoel clicks into gear in Portugal, Wout van Aert and Mikel Landa also launch 2024 as 'busy season' begins.

Read the full article at Here Come the Big Hitters: Sepp Kuss, Remco Evenepoel Debut Expectation-Loaded Seasons This Weekend on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
